message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.SE, cs.SI, cs.DB 

The paper discusses the identification of persons and things for the purpose of anti-fraud, which is a key aspect of cybersecurity. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the use of identification technologies in network security, which suggests the sub-categories cs.CY (Computers and Society) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). The paper also discusses the design of a verification platform and identification system, which suggests the sub-category cs.DB (Databases). Finally, the paper discusses the applications of identification technologies in public security, which suggests the sub-category cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
